title: PTSD rate among prison employees equals that of war veterans

title_detail.value: PTSD rate among prison employees equals that of war veterans

summary: Prison employees experience PTSD on par with Iraq and Afghanistan war veterans, a new study from a Washington State University College of Nursing researcher found.

summary_detail.value: Prison employees experience PTSD on par with Iraq and Afghanistan war veterans, a new study from a Washington State University College of Nursing researcher found.
